snippet.title: Splody
snippet.description: Classic couch competitive bomb-dropping action gameplay brought into the modern era. Place bombs, get out of the way, destroy your friends, collect power-ups, 'splode your way to victory in a variety of game modes adapted for smooth multiplayer both locally and online.

localized.description: Classic couch competitive bomb-dropping action gameplay brought into the modern era. Place bombs, get out of the way, destroy your friends, collect power-ups, 'splode your way to victory in a variety of game modes adapted for smooth multiplayer both locally and online.
